name: Wonderware
overview: Wonderware Corporation provides real-time operations management software solutions. It offers batch management software solutions to execute batching processes across various industries; data historian solutions that leverage historian technology, Web-based reporting capabilities, and open data source connectivity; enterprise integration applications to link the manufacturing systems to business applications, such as ERP, PLM, SCM, and LIMS systems; and enterprise manufacturing intelligence software solutions for companies to analyze operational performance using data analysis and reporting tools. The company also provides HMI/SCADA software solutions; manufacturing execution systems software solutions that feature a set of functional capabilities to execute operational activities; mobile solutions, which enable manufacturers and producers to manage the processes and procedures to execute various field tasks; and ArchestrA, a software architecture that allows users to standardize on a common EMI solution and propagate it across various manufacturing or infrastructure operations sites. In addition, it offers application consulting, system integration, and mobile solutions professional services. The companyâ€™s solutions enable companies to synchronize their production and industrial operations with business objectives. It offers its solutions for HMI, GeoSCADA, mobile operations, production management, manufacturing execution systems, performance management, and enterprise manufacturing intelligence, as well as for integration with asset management, supply and demand chain, and ERP applications. The company serves food and beverage, power, water and wastewater, facilities, transportation, upstream oil and gas, mining, and metals industries. Wonderware Corporation has strategic partnerships with Microsoft and SAP. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Lake Forest, California. As of 04/06/1998, Wonderware Corporation operates as a subsidiary of Invensys plc.
